TypeSignature.Value: .class public auto ansi beforefieldinit DateTimeValueSerializer extends System.Windows.Markup.ValueSerializer

summary.span: 将 的实例与 的实例进行来回转换。

span.span: Converts instances of to and from instances of .

remarks.format: ## Remarks 使用而非类型转换需要其他状态的情况下。 is used rather than for cases where type conversion requires additional state. 不属于与类型。 is not attributed to a type with . 这是因为处于 mscorlib 除外，并且 mscorlib 不能在未定义本身的特性类创建依赖关系。This is because is in mscorlib, and mscorlib cannot take dependencies on attribute classes that it does not define itself. 相反，使用情况的是特殊大小写形式到.NET Framework XAML 服务行为中的 XAML 处理器行为。Instead, usage of is special-cased into XAML processor behavior in .NET Framework XAML Services behavior. 在以前版本的.NET Framework 中，此类特定于 WPF 程序集 WindowsBase 中存在。In previous versions of the .NET Framework, this class existed in the WPF-specific assembly WindowsBase. 在[!INCLUDE[net_v40_long](~/includes/net-v40-long-md.md)]，位于 System.Xaml 程序集中。In [!INCLUDE[net_v40_long](~/includes/net-v40-long-md.md)], is in the System.Xaml assembly. 请参阅[类型从 WPF 迁移到 System.Xaml](~/docs/framework/xaml-services/types-migrated-from-wpf-to-system-xaml.md)。See [Types Migrated from WPF to System.Xaml](~/docs/framework/xaml-services/types-migrated-from-wpf-to-system-xaml.md).

remarks.format: ## Remarks 返回一个空字符串。An empty string returns . 当前实现使用内部，以及使用以下: `DateTimeStyles.RoundtripKind | DateTimeStyles.NoCurrentDateDefault | DateTimeStyles.AllowLeadingWhite | DateTimeStyles.AllowTrailingWhite`。The current implementation uses internally, and also uses the following : `DateTimeStyles.RoundtripKind | DateTimeStyles.NoCurrentDateDefault | DateTimeStyles.AllowLeadingWhite | DateTimeStyles.AllowTrailingWhite`.

Converts an instance of to a .

span.span: A string representation of the specified .

remarks.format: ## Remarks `context` 不使用此实现。`context` is not used by this implementation. XAML 值处理中发现的日期的字符串表示形式之间实现基于`en-US`区域性。String representations for dates as found in XAML value processing are based on the `en-US` culture. 这是因为 XAML 处理区分区域性的信息从概念上讲编译时和运行时阶段之间拆分，必须使用在整个已知的字符串表示形式。This is because XAML processing for culture-sensitive information is split conceptually between compile-time and run-time phases and must use a known string representation throughout. 有关详细信息，请参阅[WPF 全球化和本地化概述](~/docs/framework/wpf/advanced/wpf-globalization-and-localization-overview.md)。For more information, see [WPF Globalization and Localization Overview](~/docs/framework/wpf/advanced/wpf-globalization-and-localization-overview.md). 当前实现将取决于是否调整一个格式字符串提供方面具有值。The current implementation uses a format string that is adjusted depending on whether aspects of the supplied have values. 例如，如果没有在值，格式字符串是在窗体`yyyy-MM-dd`而不是写出完整详细级别为时间组件零值。For example, if there is no value in , the format string is in the form `yyyy-MM-dd` rather than writing out full-verbosity zero values for the time component.

span.span: is not a or is .
